description:
Namie`s brother. Because of the situation with their family she develops romantic feelings for him and tries everything to keep Seiji at her side, especially after he falls in love with Selty`s head that Namie shows him.
After saving Anri and Mika from delinquents, Mika starts stalking him out of love, leading to her breaking into Seiji`s apartment. There she discovers Selty`s head and is smashed against a wall by him, leaving her face disfigured.
Seiji stays with Mika following her plastic surgery, claiming that he found his love, and the two elope.
name: Yagiri Seiji
